rows.label: tev000395_MSG0001
rows.name: Well, if it isn't [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0002
rows.name: The view of NLA from here is incredible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0003
rows.name:
Humanity's newest city... It's a lot to soak in.
Isn't it impressive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000395_SEL0011
rows.name: Claim that New LA is quite the city.

rows.label: tev000395_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: tev000395_SEL0021
rows.name: Point out that it still has a ways to go.

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0004
rows.name: Or perhaps it's just a testament to humanity's greed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0005
rows.name:
Can't argue there. Mankind's greed is never truly sated,
after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0006
rows.name:
After the White Whale fell to pieces from the sky,
we used Miran materials to build this city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0007
rows.name:
Even a world away, human behavior never changes.
We take what we need from the world around us,
and damn the consequences.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0008
rows.name:
I mean, look at us. We land on a pristine planet,
and what's the first thing we do? Claim it, colonize it,
and start eliminating the local wildlife.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0009
rows.name:
Look, don't get me wrongâ€”I get why some of these
things are necessary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0010
rows.name:
Most of the indigens would kill us in a heartbeat,
plus we have the Ganglion to deal with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0011
rows.name:
And yet, I sometimes wonder if we should've just
stayed with Earth to the bitter end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0012
rows.name: Sorry, getting a little morose there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0013
rows.name:
Let's change the subject. Heard any good scuttlebutt
from Elma or Vandham lately?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_JNK0030
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: tev000395_SEL0031
rows.name: Confess that nothing comes to mind.

rows.label: tev000395_JNK0040
rows.name: Comply

rows.label: tev000395_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Lao a funny story about Tatsu.

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0014
rows.name: Nothing, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0015
rows.name:
Yeah, I guess there's no good gossip on your floor of
the barracks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0016
rows.name:
With all the foot traffic in your area, people probably
end up going to places like the command center in
BLADE Tower when they want to talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0017
rows.name:
And I'm sure you're no more eager to visit such places
than I am. Heh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0018
rows.name:
Still, if you ever hear anything especially juicy,
let me know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0019
rows.name:
Hah! So THAT'S why Tatsu wasn't eaten by the Prone?
Seriously?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0020
rows.name: I feel bad for the little spud, but man, that is classic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0021
rows.name:
He ate so much cranjelly, he got it all over himself,
then slipped out of those Prone hands like a wet bar
of soap...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0022
rows.name: Talk about dumb luck, yeesh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0023
rows.name:
And to think, if he hadn't crammed his face full of
cranjelly, he'd have never met you and Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0024
rows.name:
Ah, good times. But as amusing a story as that was,
it wasn't exactly what I had in mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0025
rows.name:
So if you hear anything else juicy, let me know, yeah?
And I'm not talking about cranjelly juice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0026
rows.name:
Sometimes you gotta play the angles to be an effective
BLADE, you know? Help each other out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0027
rows.name: Anyway, I'd better get back to work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000395_MSG0028
rows.name: Catch you later, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]
